text: I am already in Guatemala, now I am heading to the Presidential House to lead the Cabinet of Follow-up.

In the #EP debate today: our decisions gave a clear signal about the irreversibility+integrity of the euro. #euco
At the same time we are pursuing a social agenda as an integral part of our strategy to exit the crisis. #euco
We cannot and will not let our youngest generations down. #euco
There should not be any contradiction between the social and the competitiveness agenda. We should be equally committed to both goals. #euco
Important that #euco endorses priorities of Commission's Annual Growth Survey, pursuing growth-friendly+tailor-made fiscal consolidation.
Our efforts are not just about the economy, but about our position and influence in the world. About the European way of life. #euco
